<td valign="top" cellpadding="0"><code language="php">
class foo
    # Nested under public (pub), protected(pro) and private(pri) keywords.
    pub
        # Members of same type can be nested as well.
        @str
            biz = "foz"
            baz = "faz"
        @int tip = 42
    # If only one, one line must be used.
    pro @str pro = "pro"
    pri
        @str
            pri1 = "pri1"
            pri2 = "pri2"

    @str bar
    @str baz
    fn __construct
        echo this.biz , bar , baz

    @str zup
    public static staticMethod
        echo zup

foo = new foo('kit' 'kat')
foo::staticMethod('bup')
